channel.title: language on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in language on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-09
item.description: Reddit to roll out personalized end-of-year recaps with stats about users’ habits (3 minute read) Reddit is rolling out a recap feature for all users that will include a summary of time spent on the platform, among other statistics.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-12
item.description: Microsoft and Nvidia team up to train one of the world’s largest language models (7 minute read) Microsoft and Nvidia have trained what they claim is the largest and most capable AI-powered language model to date.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-26
item.description: Google launches its third major operating system, Fuchsia (3 minute read) Fuchsia is Google’s latest operating system for the Google Home Hub.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-03
item.description: LG set to release ‘rollable’ phone next year (4 minute read) LG Electronics will launch a ‘rollable’ smartphone in early 2021.
